UpdateContactAndAccountInfoExternalComma.description: Update employee contact and account information

givenName.title: String
givenName.description: The employee's first- and middle names.

addressLine.title: String
addressLine.description: The address line of the employee

addressLineClear.title: Boolean
addressLineClear.description: Indicates if the AddressLine should be cleared regardless of the value in AddressLine

careOfAddress.title: String
careOfAddress.description: The C/O address of the employee.

careOfAddressClear.title: Boolean
careOfAddressClear.description: Indicates if the CareOfAddress should be cleared regardless of the value in CareOfAddress

cityClear.title: Boolean
cityClear.description: Indicates if the City should be cleared regardless of the value in City

placeClear.title: Boolean
placeClear.description: Indicates if the Place should be cleared regardless of the value in Place

postalCode.title: String
postalCode.description: The postal code of the employee

postalCodeClear.title: Boolean
postalCodeClear.description: Indicates if the PostalCode should be cleared regardless of the value in PostalCode

country.title: String
country.description: The country of the employee to be created

countryClear.title: Boolean
countryClear.description: Indicates if the Country should be cleared regardless of the value in Country

phoneNumberClear.title: Boolean
phoneNumberClear.description: Indicates if the PhoneNumber should be cleared regardless of the value in PhoneNumber

mobileNumberClear.title: Boolean
mobileNumberClear.description: Indicates if the MobileNumber should be cleared regardless of the value in PhoneNumber

privatePhoneNumberClear.title: Boolean
privatePhoneNumberClear.description: Indicates if the PrivatePhoneNumber should be cleared regardless of the value in PhoneNumber

privateEmailClear.title: Boolean
privateEmailClear.description: Indicates if the PrivateEmail should be cleared regardless of the value in PrivateEmail

emailClear.title: Boolean
emailClear.description: Indicates if the Email should be cleared regardless of the value in Email

adUsername.title: String
adUsername.description: The AD user name for the employee

createAdLogin.description:
Specifies if the employee should have an AD login (organisational account).
If `false`, the SchoolAdministration.Host.ExternalApi.Employees.Commands.UpdateContactAndAccountInfo.UpdateContactAndAccountInfoExternalCommand.AdUsername will be cleared

schoolCode.title: String
schoolCode.description: The school code for which command is performed.

Bearer.name: Authorization
Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}"
